Dataset Name: Spatial epigenome-transcriptome co-profiling of mammalian tissues
Dataset Description: We present spatially resolved high-spatial-resolution genome-wide co-mapping of epigenome and transcriptome by simultaneously profiling of chromatin accessibility and gene expression (spatial-ATAC-RNA-seq), as well as histone modification and gene expression (spatial-CUT&Tag-RNA-seq) on the same tissue section at cellular level by combining the microfluidic deterministic barcoding strategy in DBiT-seq and the chemistry used in ATAC-seq/CUT&Tag.
Dataset Design: Spatially resolved co-sequencing of epigenome and transcriptome in mouse embryos and mouse brains.

Dataset Description: Metastasis and failure of present-day therapies represent the most common causes of mortality in patients with cutaneous melanoma. Dataset Design: This dataset includes WES, WGS, and RNAseq data generated from autopsy samples.
Dataset Assay: Patient Derived Xenograft, RNA Sequencing, Whole Genome Sequencing, Whole Exome Sequencing, Structural Variant Analysis
